Issue.creator: ameijer
Issue.description: In cello/src/agent/ansible/roles/cloud_aws/provision/tasks/apply.yml, the aws device name of the root disk is misnamed. xvda is used for external, non root EBS volume mounts. However, this description is describing a root volume on this instance, which by convention is mounted on /dev/sda1. We should fix that to reflect the proper device name.
